text:
*[HIRING] [REMOTE] [PART TIME]*
*HIDEUP is looking for a Junior Full Stack and Frontend Developer. They are utilizing AI and machine learning in the healthcare industry by implementing devices in hospitals/clinics etc. A very innovative and unique company that is growing extremely fast.*

*Junior Full Stack Developer: 60%/70% backend and 40% frontend (MEAN) Salary: $1000 / month - 10hrs / month. Stock options, medical/dental benefits, etc.*

*Junior Front End Developer: Will be 80% front end and 20% back end (MEAN). Will be working on an internal website, client dashboards/portals, and applications. Salary: $1000 / month - 10hrs / month*

*Start-up company where you can have stock options and big growth apps. Please DM me if you are interested. Must be based in the US / Europe.*

elements.text: HIDEUP is looking for a Junior Full Stack and Frontend Developer. They are utilizing AI and machine learning in the healthcare industry by implementing devices in hospitals/clinics etc. A very innovative and unique company that is growing extremely fast.
Junior Full Stack Developer: 60%/70% backend and 40% frontend (MEAN) Salary: $1000 / month - 10hrs / month. Stock options, medical/dental benefits, etc.
Junior Front End Developer: Will be 80% front end and 20% back end (MEAN). Will be working on an internal website, client dashboards/portals, and applications. Salary: $1000 / month - 10hrs / month
Start-up company where you can have stock options and big growth apps. Please DM me if you are interested. Must be based in the US / Europe.

text: Hey Hideo, does the role involve Julia? If so, in what capacity?

elements.text: Hey Hideo, does the role involve Julia? If so, in what capacity?
